website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Ignite Mesh is a road running shoe designed for neutral pronators. The shoe features maximum cushioning, flexibility and comfort. It received praises from users but a few are also disappointed. The Ignite mesh needs improvement but others still found the shoe to be a good option for daily training and short runs.
pros: The shoe delivers a comfortable ride, according to some reviews
The cushioning of the Puma Ignite Mesh provides soft underfoot protection and high energy return
A few number of users noticed the reliable traction and sturdy build of the shoe’s outsole unit
The forefoot grooves offers maximum flexibility for a smoother transition from heel to toe
The ultra-thin tongue gained positive reviews from runners because it gives added comfort all throughout the run
cons: Some runners mentioned that the shoe was poorly made because the stitching and fabrics wear off quickly
A few runners complained that the shoe feels too tight for them
According to view reviews, the shoe feels heavy

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are good for walking not running
customer_reviews.text: The shoes had tight widths. Also because there were much cushion on the heel, I ended up running incorrectly in them. I decided to turned them into my normal walking shoes after running in them for 2 miles every day for a week; my foot were sore after a couple of hours of use a day even for walking. Perhaps I need 8.5 instead, however 8 fit perfectly in length.I went back to my minimalist shoes which were the vibram five fingers for running as my foot were free to spread out at contact. My foot were no longer in sore.
customer_reviews.author: Thinh

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Comfortable at an Affordable Price
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were definitely worth buying. I couldn't find a better pair of shoes at this price point that were up to par in terms of style and quality. Personally, I have flat feet, so I am hard pressed to find shoes that I can comfortably wear for long periods of time, and these shoes are no exception. The style of these shoes are also what gravitated me towards them, making the shoes look more extravagant than they actually are. Despite these things, the shoes do get dirty fairly easily, but as long as you are willing enough to take the time to clean your shoes every once in a while, then these shoes are absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Azimi

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable, good-fitting sneaks
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable sneaks that I wear all day long, as I walk on the concrete floors in our warehouse at work. I wear them every other day and use another pair of sneaks on the off days to give these things a chance to dry out and air out. They're pretty decent looking, but the white part above the sole gets dirty pretty quickly, as does the white part on any pair of sneaks.
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: Great crossfit shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is not meant for long distance running or walking. I've put it to the test several times. But for sprinting, weight training, or crosstraining they hold up very well. Colors are very nice too. The highlights in these I have are actually like a neon yellow. Not that electric green that you see in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: BROOKDawg1

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Nice Looking
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable and great for all kinds of exercise. I've always had high arches and most shoes never work for my feet. Pumas have been one of the only ones that work for me. These are great and the orange color is awesome! I may buy this again once my current shoes ware out.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes because he has nartow feet and they are the only brand that fits without gapping in the heel, also the only running shoes that he can wear the same as his shoe size. Pumas run a little narrower than all other brands we' ve tried. We have both purchased many colors. I just ordered 3 more pairs. Great selection of colors and last but not least, very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn B. Varlack

customer_reviews.title: This is the best shoes I've ever buy online so far
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shoes I've ever buy online so far. It is very comfortable and perfect width. My shoes size is 7.5" but I bought this shoes in size 8 and it fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sleek

customer_reviews.title: They're very comfortable for what I need them for and I like ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a runner. I wear these working out and walking the gym treadmill. These are a well-cushioned, flexible, slipper without much support or motion control. The toe box is low and the heel cup is flexible. They're very comfortable for what I need them for and I like the way they look. But if you're a pronator or need an arch, better put your inserts in these.
customer_reviews.author: Jordanmilo

customer_reviews.title: I do really like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I do really like these shoes... they fit me a little big but I also erred on ordering a larger size vs one that could have possibly been too small. I'm just not one for shipping shoes back and forth from an online vendor to get the exact right size like I would in a store setting. The shoes look great, are comfortable and based on the few outdoor runs so far will be a great pair for this spring/summer.
customer_reviews.author: Woodworking in MA

customer_reviews.title: 170 miles and still as good as new. They do need time to break in though.
customer_reviews.text: I already have ~170 miles on these and there is minimal sign of wear. These shoes continue to outperform most running shoes I've owned so far. I ran a half marathon in these recently and finished with no pain/ minimal stress in the legs. It did take a few weeks for my feet to adjust to these but that's true of most new shoes.
customer_reviews.author: MNM

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Got foot cramps at first but after running in then for a while they became my running shoes. Put over 30 Miles of running in these shoes. Would buy again. One of the best running shoes i have ever experienced
customer_reviews.author: Dis Rojanasopondist

customer_reviews.title: My Son Loves These.
customer_reviews.text: Apparently I ordered the wrong shoes, but my son really loves these so that was a bonus. He is a rough and tumble 10 y/o who has an adult size foot. These are holding up well and he is pleased with them. Puma is our go to sneaker for him and this deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W.R.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Bought these to do some home workouts... HOME WORKOUTS...I'm not even going out on the street with gravel, concrete, glass, etc. Yet the shoe is already flaking off a bit at the toes...
customer_reviews.author: Tommy C.

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable. I have purchased many Pumas in the past ...
customer_reviews.text: The orange on these shoes is a little brighter than I expected but I ended up liking them a lot. They are comfortable. I have purchased many Pumas in the past and am a fan of the brand, but this is the first running shoe from Puma that I have tried. Overall I am very pleased. They fit well.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love thee shoes. The color represented it ad pics seem more yellow though. The shoes have a tinge of being lime ish color. Depending on 5he light you're in. Great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Bo622

customer_reviews.title: Solid sneaker
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are great. More fashion vs running which is why I purchased them. Very comfortable and true to size. I wear 12 in all brands except Nike (13) and these run true to size. If you have Pumas and they fit order same size. I have dozens and only one or two are a bit tight.
customer_reviews.author: MylesD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoes!!really comfortable for walking or running activities.
customer_reviews.author: tuteoli2

customer_reviews.title: Color is a bit off
customer_reviews.text: Love them but color is not right... These are more of a lime green and I like to match so that was a issue as I matched to color shown. Now that I have the right shirt I love these... Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Raini Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Break in period was very light. Use these to play tennis every week. Unfortunately the color variations are not attractive. I wish I could get more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Tony M

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe Comfortable Run
customer_reviews.text: Researching shoes for weeks to find a good stable running shoe. This shoe definitely was up to par! I am Military and run 5x a week I purchased this shoe for that purpose only I will say its been one of the best running shoes by far and you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: Husband is loving the shoes- would love to give more detail but the four stars and ...
customer_reviews.text: Husband is loving the shoes- would love to give more detail but the four stars and "about half a size larger than expected" we're all I could get out of him;)
customer_reviews.author: Cassie A

customer_reviews.title: Make sure they actually fit
customer_reviews.text: The shoe label SAYS 12 but these are on the large side of 12. My feet slid around in them causing ankle/knee problems when trying to jog. Switched back to an ancient pair of Puma running shoes that fit properly and the ankle/knee issues subsided.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Coolest looking and most comfortable running shoes I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Coolest looking and most comfortable running shoes I have owned. I love the bold colors. I did have to order 1/2 size larger than I usually wear, but Amazon's "Find the right size" tool took care of that for me before ordering. I also got a smoking deal on these from Amazon so I'm definitely impressed with the value for the money. Definitely recommend these for running or just casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy P.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Everyone said order 1/2 size up is wrong. These are actually bigger than my Reebok and my converse shoes. They are somewhat light weight and Comfortable to run in. I'm sure they'll be even better once they are broken in
customer_reviews.author: Really a person!

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are beautiful, they look and feel better than expected
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful, they look and feel better than expected, and they fit perfect. Some people say they run small or big but I think they fit on point to my normal size. They are just a very slight bit narrow in the ball/toe area, but for me its not very noticeable. I was very nervous about buying shoes without trying them on first. I am very satisfied with my purchase so far. again, these shoes are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: They do fit true to size but they are a little narrow, so if you have a wide foot you might wanna go up a half size. Cushioning is good, but near as responsive as "boost", but still pretty good. For the price, it's a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: DPal

customer_reviews.title: not close to the best I have owned for the same price
customer_reviews.text: I will not purchase again, not close to the best I have owned for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: John Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: They're ok! I like a little more stability in my shoe. They're a little loose around the toes but fit great everywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: DTC3

customer_reviews.title: nice shoes i saw the blue in a julian edelman commercial bought the black for cheap
customer_reviews.text: pretty good pair for the price cant beat it. have bought more expensive shoes that these compare with. stabilty and plenty of cushion
customer_reviews.author: Jessej

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for exercising however I love the comfort and color I wear them every chance I get.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dukes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very light and comfortable street running shoe. Would not recommend for trails at all. Love the look.
customer_reviews.author: Justin McGovern

customer_reviews.title: great fit and feel
customer_reviews.text: great fit and feel, however the sole only lasted a few months. The rubber started coming off in chunks only a few short months of not very hard use. disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of sneakers I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best pair of sneakers I have ever owned!! This is the second pair. I have them in the closet ready for when my first pair wears out, which appears to be a while from now. Highly recommend as a casual sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B. McCloskey

customer_reviews.title: Color more neon yellow with a green tint
customer_reviews.text: Color is more of a neon yellow, kinda greenish. I always add an extra arch support to all my tennis shoes anyway.
customer_reviews.author: DietDrDew

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, I completed my first marathon with these
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a spare pair for my marathon. I used this for my marathon and practiced long runs with these, I would definitely recommend these. These provide good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: RS2010

customer_reviews.title: 100% strong buy
customer_reviews.text: I can't complain shoes are good not a single problem strong buy
customer_reviews.author: edwin diaz

customer_reviews.title: Overall, not too bad.
customer_reviews.text: The primary reason I purchased these was for a warm vacation so the mesh was desired. I was disappointed there was no arch support which limits the comfort of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good running support for 2-3 mile jogs or short sprints.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. Made running uncomfortable. If you're a beginner runner then this shoe is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Fine stuff
customer_reviews.text: Thanks, under the insoles of my Puma size 12 (M), written that it is size 11. Confusing.
customer_reviews.author: V. A.

customer_reviews.title: but once broken in they're great. I ran a mile in 6
customer_reviews.text: They're tight at first, especially for me having wide feet, but once broken in they're great. I ran a mile in 6:30 compared to the 7min miles in my nikes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ultra comfy and one of the best running slash
customer_reviews.text: kinda weighty for running shoes, but this seems durable, ultra comfy and one of the best running slash, training volleyball shes you can get at this price.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat comfortable but they feel at least a half size too small.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for my fitness needs (low mileage runs, jump rope and plyometrics). Also looks great.

customer_reviews.title: ... tongue is very thin but overall this is a comfortable shoe. Forever Faster
customer_reviews.text: The tongue is very thin but overall this is a comfortable shoe. Forever Faster!

customer_reviews.title: Continuing PUMA Tradition
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. I've always liked the fit of Pumas better than any other sneaker and these continue that trend. They're super light and my heels haven't felt better in years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Like running on clouds and they're very light.
customer_reviews.author: marcos arreola

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent shoe, arrived in good condition, a little big compared to my size. Satisfied Customer.
customer_reviews.author: Edinson C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment in the product.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are too small and when I return home from work, I was disappointed in the product.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice. I do door to door sales and these are perfect

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. When I opened the package I saw that the right show had an orange blemish on it. I tried to clean it but it seems to be permanent

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe. They are a little snug at first but they fit great.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great training shoe. Have even raced in these shoes. Couldn't beat the price.

customer_reviews.title: lalala
customer_reviews.text: I'm China. The shoes arrived one day earlier than expected. They're soft and light. Nice shoes! However, I found that they're made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These things look good, they fit nice and they're pretty comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These things look good, they fit nice and they're pretty comfortable. I bought them because I had my eye on them and the price dropped pretty dramatically. For what I paid, it was a great value. That said, these aren't as comfortable as my Under Armour runners. Maybe that was just a great pair, or maybe these aren't so good. Still, I wouldn't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Missus or Mr.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, fits nicely and the price is good too.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe? But not as comfortable as New Balance Fresh Foam and other running shoes

customer_reviews.title: Quality isn't the best. I love the color but the paint under ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality isn't the best. I love the color but the paint under the mesh chipped where my toe is and now you can see my socks through the mesh. The blue paint on the non mesh parts chipped off on the first day, leaving an ugly dark color underneath. Still super comfortable though, I couldn't keep walking 6-8 miles a day in my oxfords and these take care of that while still giving a bit of edge.
customer_reviews.author: Jayden Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good for running and just running. a bit tight so i sometimes don't wear socks.
customer_reviews.author: Ehsan bozorgi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and feels comfortable.... Can't wait to start running....
customer_reviews.author: Shalom Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves em, I think he's a puma fan now.
customer_reviews.author: James lee Troesch

customer_reviews.title: not yellow, but neon.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit perfectly. I give it 4 stars because shoes are more of a neon green with hint of yellow color. The pictures online are more yellow then neon. Not returning. The color is not terrible, but just a heads of up for everyone that may purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Rather right, but once you wear them in they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not the best looking after a little use.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were very comfortable, I felt like walking on clouds. The real issue was cosmetic and durability. I choose the black and white color combination, the sole after a few wear became gray with some yellow spots that were impossible to clean, so the shoe look old after just a few uses. I used these shoes one day every weekend so they did not have a heavy or severe use and like a year later, the bonded support came apart form the mesh. The shoes ended in the trash can and they did not leave a god taste after all.
customer_reviews.author: C76MAS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for track and field drills as it was designed ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a runners shoe period the hell strike is top of the line and the shoe is extremely light. Excellent for track and field drills as it was designed for the fastest man in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Wore them yesterday for the first time, right out of the box. I did some plyos, speed, cardio and strength training in them. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great look
customer_reviews.text: The shoes came as expected. Good fit for my feet and very comfortable. Very happy with my purchase and will probably get another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: David Carattini

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 11, but these feel a little bit tight in the toe area.
